WRITING.TITLE: [PC] [2000ish?] 16/32 bit RPG
WRITING.TEXT: -PC -Adventure/RPG -Cyberpunk/wasteland -2D sidescrolling -Main charater is a teen girl with short hair bluegreen dress, a light sword, a pet dragon(small) I will be as specific as possible. Don't have photos or videos cause its an Indie game and maybe some of you played it. I don't know what time it was released. I played it on PC. Its RPG with 16/32 bits characters. Female protagonist to be specific a girl around teens. Has a light sword as a weapon. Also there's a small pet dragon you can acquire that eat fruits in the screen also fights enemies shoots small fire. Set like in a cyberpunk world her stepfather and stepbrother look like robots but she is a human. Moments that stick to is you fight his stepbrother in mechanical suit and he shoots dark bubbles, her dragon gains a power-up when it fuses with a mask you can now use it to fly shortly also the best and saddest is she dies in the end fighting like the government of aliens times past, they make a statue of her. Her dragon stays besides her until it grow up into a really big one and then also die. The END
Wow thanks man. Ive been looking and thinking of this for ages finally. But really thanks.
I still believe to the Blood Moon Ball.
I need to see a psychologist after the episodes.

WRITING.TITLE: With Rune overhaul what are the others way to spend IP.
WRITING.TEXT: With the Rune overhaul there's nothing much to spend IP with. Have all the Champs. Changed name twice and still sitting in more than 30k IP. IP Chromas are just once in a while, Summoner Icons are always RP or either 1 IP. How about making Hextech Keys purchasable with IP? So that we all can open out 30 Hextech Chest sitting in Loot Inventory.
Well thats one way to spend it but mastering champs takes time. Then your IP will be stacking up again. I also buy Champion Shards to get the new Champs thru rerolls.
How about being able to buy it once a week? So that players cant frequently buy keys.
The problem is the key fragments drop rate. Its not enough to keep up with the hextech box refresh rate.
Well its a game currency so you need to spend it

WRITING.TITLE: A little useless thing I notice in the new line Star Guardian Skins.
WRITING.TEXT: Why does Syndra doesn't have the same pair of high cut boots.See its useless info but Im really curious is this by design or are they bullying her. https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zYArEgG_0p0/WYoYXMBnFOI/AAAAAAABEjg/xTRp-WLYGc8MPLpPsCzmEX9erZz32tBCACLcBGAs/s1600/5cutstar.jpg Edit: Picture link.
Yeah why is it only Syndra.

1. If you cant beat a certain stage in ToaN you just need to improve runes. Toan is just basically a rune check. 2.Tesarion makes life easy in female boss rotation. 3. ToaH is not hard. You just need the right mons and its just tedious. 4. Always bring spec for boss stages especially 100th floor (male) 5. If you dont have Tesa and having hard time on 100th female build the dark warbear 2* easy to skillup. Put on desp. Now you have a realible stunner for Female boss spawns.(using 3rd skill) 6. Fuck artamiel and Akroma stages. Akroma stage needs neal and mav and a slow dark mon (vero basalt remove spd 2 break vio). 7. Artamiel.Def break arta (1st scale with def). Stun monkey and yeti. Dont hit stunned units. If have immu kill yeti first. if you dont kill monkeys first (stuns)
Vero needs to be tanky enough so you just need one healer(Bella). Adding Colleen will make run safer also heal block for arta but will make killing Monkey and yeti's harder.
Kill Verde first also use turbulence on them. You just need to stun lock the Verde. Leo and spec doesnt do that much damage.
Its better to kill Verde first. There is a chance that leo gets low less than 30% and one shot someone. As i said Leo and Spec doesnt do damage verde is the problem cause he multiplies turns.
Raids
Lucasha seems good because you only have Adrian and Colleen for Shield break.You have the spd break on hwa. Drop bella and add another DD
Really OP for Dungeons. Fatal or Rage. Damage all the way
Not exactly. Elemental Dungeons. But squeezing her to GB 10 not for now.

You always need vio for your shield breaker.You dont need that much spd in necro (Necro boss spd cap) and 1 heal is enough you dont need to tank out necro it damage increases overtime so kill it as fast as possible. Turn order should be like this 1.Adrian/Colleen (better if Adrian first to buff team) 2.Adrian/Colleen 3.Lucasha then Hwa/DD Basically Buffer then Shield breaker, slow, DD Also Adrian 100% or at least 85% CR to have 3 hits in 1st skill edit:format
Just add Mav and Baretta team like this Baretta L,Vero, Bella ,Woosa , Mav that should auto most TOA stages. (even boss)
Well if she's fast its fairly okay as long as she apply the slow debuff thats what you need her for. And yes you can use XL for your main DPS in Necro( Need to move last)
What do you want to prioritize Faster GB or TOA? Basalt Woonhak for TOA. And why do you focus towers in GB10? Im confused.
Good in despair/rev doesn't provide DoTs can do in TOA but there are better mons to use, nothing else just a stun machine.
First of all there is an option that will make your mons target the Giant only. Alicia good unit to 6* or Basalt/Chasun for TOA
Tesa - Oblivion(for passives) / Lupinus - Silence(Skills with cooldown). You really dont need silence in TOA because you dont give turns to the enemy mons and you cant silence bosses.
All 3 can be use in PvP but Alicia can also be use in PvE(DB10 nuker). So Alicia (also really fast farmer).
No you dont vio on raids.

If you can why not also 44% hp lead really helps for dungeons that is why ppl fuse him. Alicia on the other hand really fast fodder farmer with 2 AoE good for thrash waves if you want to spd up clear time.
Its either basalt or spectra. woonhak is good but need skillups imo. Basalt is good in any stage and spec are for faster boss stage. Okeanos stuns are too rng reliant.
yes
Leo if you have one. Really doesnt that much you want spd even a little to anything
You said it yourself. Verde is just use to increase turns. and either he move first or last so youre good to go.
How? Junos are actually harder than the vero aria wave.
Oh I see your team comp is for boss and only have one stunner which is baretta. You will really have a hard time.
Youre in the right track in ToA 6 star all key mons like Baretta and Mav. Spec good for Boss stages even ordinary but very slow.
Hemos -Water Grim Reaper (farmable) Thrain - if youre lucky with LnD Mantura - So good also LnD
Keep devilmons for now. Both work fine even without skillups especially Hwa. No Mons for DB in the list. Mav or Aria for ToaH. I suggest Mav you will need the provoke at ToaH 50

Then Briand less cooldown on S3 is great in upper floors. I highly suggest Mav if youre aiming higher in ToaH because really trust me Woonsa will 1 shot your mons without provoke. Even the dark sylph 1 shots anything.
Theo

First is to fuse Vero. 6* him. Then try to climb Giants when done. If not Farm lower stable Giants. Lapis works as a farmer but seeing you have fei she works. Rune the Vamp given in quest you can do Tamor Hard or Hell with that.
Yes still need that 45 accuracy.
We have same mons. Just use Woosa Baretta Mantura Vero Bella. Baretta or Vero Lead.
Do ToaH you have the nicest core ToaH mons.
The color?
Manual but it is safe. You need Mav to auto it you know Woosa infinite S3.
Yes you have Mav and verde you will get as much as turn as possible. Just as the other one said just 6* spec and boss will be easy.
Maybe Grego instead of Hraes

WRITING.TITLE: Skin Concept : Santa Yorick
WRITING.TEXT: Well you know Yorick... no new skin for few years... Well as the title said Christmas theme Yorick-esque Main appearance Yorick in Santa Costume. Classic Red Santa Hat yadda yadda. His Shovel can be a small Christmas tree with a Star at the end. (Passive) His tombs will look like gifts (Ghouls) Well ghouls in Elf Costume (Q) Press Q the Star lit up then a Snow particle when hit. (W) Green garland with Christmas lights (if you want you can add custom sound that plays a Christmas song and when you hit the wall the lights dim) (E) The cone thing is in Snow particle Mark Champs have mistletoe mark instead (R) The Mist Maiden will have a Rudolph costume while walking leaves snow trail particle. Still can be better. edit:format
copyrights? we don't want rito another case of skin being base onto something that has copyrights.
If they would go to this Santa look design Im pretty sure it will look like the Krampus in Krampus(film) not the one base on folklore.
Remove spectra. Swap when boss stage.
Im just here to see the obligatory no Mihyang in SS memes

Working to fuse Vero is the right choice. But you need to 5* something to be a farmer to do that and also the rune to put in it. So do it Ike this. 1. 5* farmer 2. Finish scenario for runes 3. Farm to Fuse Vero
In which stage do you die?Zaiross or the Dragon?
I assume you use a face team because you use 2 strippers (Megan,Bella). Try to do Tower right then dragon you have verde vero so i think you dont you have problem cleansing DoTs.

WRITING.TITLE: Attack Bar Increase and Reduction
WRITING.TEXT: Recently i pulled Leo and now having some fun with it in PvP with Leo Megan Lush Arang (L). I found him very good and strong as a supp with all fight runes same as Arang but can be easily countered with Will runes now here is the thing that bugs me. Block beneficial doesn't block Attack Bar Increase but Attack Bar reduction can be block by Will runes. Why is that? Is Attack bar Reduction a debuff or Immunity just block any harmful effects in general?
Lamors easily obtainable. hmmmmmmm
Well my main point in this post is the second paragraph. I have no problem with spd just the Attack bar reduction being block by will but Attack bar boost cant be block by block beneficial effects.

Make it pass through Will runes but still resistible with resist. Just negate Immunity but still resistable with resistance check. Because of as attack bar reduction works he is completely block by will runes.
Tablo?
Tilasha + Rama
Try sending ticket to com2us and beg
Finally Bulldozer, Driller Skillups
This. Guessing when Halphas is in 50% really not that hard. Just apply before 50%.
Still use thrain on ToaH well ocasionally.
Just go Full rev
Try Nox. Disable root. Problem solve.

WRITING.TITLE: Another site alternative (on-progress)
WRITING.TEXT: Some of you may have heard or start in this site "AnimeUltima". The old site died years ago (3-4-5 yrs.) but old staff decided to revive the site. The site is till in progress but usable and the libraries are being updated. Whats working on the site: -Account creation (you dont need account to watch but better to have one cause of episode tracking) -Episode Tracking (follow your favorite anime and get notifications if its updated/new episodes realease) -Calendar Schedule (well anime episode release schedule duh..) -On-Going Shows -Videos in 480p,720p(some) Also still some things planned in the future -Forum -Profile shennanigans LINK: [AnimeUltima](https://animeultima.eu) EDIT: THEY HAVE 1080P NOW
I heard theres a plan to add good dubbed anime.
Around a 100mb or so.
Its kind of a budget site to watch. Max res. I know they would upload is 720p. Im no sitedev but the site is fairly new maybe they would. You can ask on their Discord.
Yeah I know but the one that makes AU great on its prime wayback was the forum. And as someine that lives on country with shit internet this sites are godsend.

Still Garo gt;Laika.

After reading the comments i just don't get it why are you so fixated to encourage people to not fuse Vero. His not good but not bad either. If you're a newbie to this game not fusing Vero is not the end of the world but you're really gonna have a bad time starting your dungeon teams. I think you have experience so that is how you can optimize your monsters and runes to work perfectly but not all newbies will know right away what to keep and what to sell. Also if people have 2A's Kro they're not Beginner level anymore.

gt; New players aren't going to make anywhere near the same judgement calls on what runes to sell, keep, upgrade, etc. This. Even if you copy the same monster if the grade of runes is not it's not gonna work. Newbies have no experience whatsoever when they start. Heck I +15 a white rune back then.
All I wanna know about this newer players hitting G1 easily if they are at Asia server. Cause if it is thats another greater feat

Not just p2w players but the amount of players with 33 lead,halphas, white panda, a combination of two from above or all three is insane during rush hour. Having none of the three expects you have a greater rune quality that normal.
Also the amount of time they spend in dungeons. I know some g3 players have dedicated pilots just for farming dungeons almost 24/7.
Why nerf him though?
This. Even if you have Lushen doesnt mean youll go long with lushen in rta or Arena. YOU NEED THE RUNES TO SUPPORT unlike twins where you just put shitty vio and they will still do the job.
Well because they put resources into it. Good monster is bad without good runes. Its like saying nerf this monster because my runes are shit so i can catch up.

PVE-wise twins on bad vio sets still does sub 50s runs you cant do that on lushen. PvP-wise theyre a 2 in 1 monster that strips reduc attack bar def break and tons of damage EVERY TURN you cant compare that to a single nuke that easily countered. Of course they will need to nerf that PvO aspect if they want to go "eSports"
I mean if they want him to pull great mons why now. All of this is just speculations and i believe in YDCB's thought process he will ask an LnD instead of elemental xD

WRITING.TITLE: Make Laika's Skill2 Justice into Torrent!? Thoughts?

WRITING.TEXT: Read this in 125 Asia's chat. At first like yeah would be nice but then I remember his "*buffed*" passive reducing 35% to 30% max hp that can be dealt to you by a strike/attack. Having a comeback mechanic like torrent would be good to Laika instead of just being a Punching bag for Water DD's. Having a safety net to easily set for Torrent makes sense with his passive.

Thats how Leo and Ragdoll are played. You either kill them early and get punished by passives or you get soloed later by torrent and insane HealVamp. I havent use mine have really good vamp runes but I haven't even use him except Labyrinth for killing Windboss.
He's still easily beaten. Aegir/Monkey/Garo/ and more multihits OP picks in RTA
Neither Laika have spd cap or Attack bar increase. The point is you use them on certain situations not to roll over them with this monsters with this Laika will have a place now in competitive.
If you havent seen this then here it is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2hwXDSVdJwQ

Well thats point even if you buff him to this he will not be that OP in RTA cause its infested of multihit stripping DD/Supports. Even if you dont pick Laika they will still pick aegir shihou or Loren cause they universally good with Laika or with no Laika.
*thats the point*
You know why did they nerf him cause he 1v3 ppl with stuns and his passive is bugged
Absolute game changer!
everyone on reddit is G3 /s

WRITING.TITLE: Only a few days left before RTA Tally! Base on your RTA experience which monsters desperately needs a nerf? (Buffing units are lame)

WRITING.TEXT: Honestly Aegir - too much turn cycling. Strip reduce attack bar with brand on low cooldowns thats too much for a Nat4. Either Increase S3 cooldown, reduce accuracy rate to steal buff and attack bar, reduce ttack bar steal to 25% or cant steal attack bar if there is no attack bar to steal.
Same. Loren may be an insane attack bar control unit but you need a really fast set with high accuracy because his skills even if max is not 100% rate. Jeanne is just cancerous because of vio.
No Darion or Dias. Yes that team could work but it will take too long = more chances to fail. No debuff scaling DD's or reduce attack bar.
Yep that would be a nice nerf without affecting his PVE use.
He cant increase attack bar on revenge proc that will not make him unusable from his PVE use.
I dont know which is better to be honest but i dont wanna get shitted on by an aegir that can use his s3 and s2 every time he moves thats just really unfair to play against.
Nerfing fire lich = Diana will be rampant and Op.
Because its pretty stupid to steal attack bar when theres really no attack bar in the first place keeping Aegir Attack bar stacked.
Yeah com2us esports my ass if you cant even fix this kind of exploits that known seasons ago.
thats a hp%.......
Why are you getting downvoted?? That's the legit advice. No need to build other mons for dungeon, twins and 2A dogs are Dungeon run Kings and Queens. Galatians 4:16

WRITING.TITLE: The first person who face Hathor in RTA must been like
